recipesJson.name: Rose Milk REMIX
recipesJson.author: Gachatay
recipesJson.description:
**UPDATE:** With the HS French vanilla ice cream @ 1% being discovered feel free to replace TFA VBIC with that and bump the TFA Strawberry to 3%...it's great either way

Rose milk by Diy or Die was hands down the best S&C that I tried and I knew after my first 30ml concentrate was gone as fast as I got it...I had to try and nail this down. This is very close in profile IMO and If you like S&C, try this and you won't be disappointed. Feel free to swap the TPA Strawberry with Straw Ripe for a brighter version that's just as good. I also must stress you try the original for yourself... Enjoy!

reviews.text: Because I'm a big Strawberry Cream fan I mixed a 60 ml off the bat. I did do it with Ripe instead and got to say it was very good not to strong on the strawberry more a lighter strawberry not flavor. I actually really enjoy this flavor a lot. I don't know if I will ever try the real version unless Wayne releases the recipe as I don't usally buy one shots. But overall this was a very great flavor. Well done.
Definitely a favorite for me, I've only had it as a SNV but i'm sure ill be done with the 15ml by tomorrow. I'm going to mix a bigger bottle now and let it sit for a few days.
